fields.name: RegistrationDateTime
fields.description: The registration date from the market document.

fields.name: storedTime
fields.description: The time the point was stored and thus available as a published point.

fields.name: time
fields.description: Operation time (the time when the power was consumed/produced/exchanged).

fields.name: year
fields.description: The year part of the 'time' field.

fields.name: month
fields.description: The month part of the 'time' field.

fields.name: day
fields.description: The day part of the 'time' field.
